Description:
Prohibition Notice served, 

You do not have effective measures in place to use Emery Cloth in a safe manner.

Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to dangerous parts of the machinery, namely the rotating spindle and workpiece of the Hardinge HLV-H lathe (marked with volts 440/400; control voltage 230; wiring diagram 80018648000).

Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to dangerous parts of the machinery, namely the rotating chuck and tool of the Chester 836 Turret Milling Machine (serial no. NX1910288).

Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to ensure that the Vodex local exhaust ventilation system in the workshop, provided to prevent or control exposure to substances which are hazardous to health, namely process dust, has been thoroughly examined and tested by a competent person in the last 14 months.
